solution_line_template: He is able to carry {non_apple_pounds} pounds of watermelon, grapes, and oranges because{watermelon_pounds}+{grapes_pounds}+ {oranges_pounds} = <<{non_apple_pounds}={non_apple_pounds}>>{non_apple_pounds}
He can buy {apple_pounds} pounds of apple because{total_capacity}-{non_apple_pounds} = <<{total_capacity}-{non_apple_pounds}={apple_pounds}>>{apple_pounds}
